content: विरल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Having interstices, separated by intervals, thin, not thick or compact; विपर्यासं यातो घनविरलभावः क्षितिरुहां <ls>U. 2. 27</ls>; <ls n="U.">1. 20</ls>; भवति विरलभक्तिर्म्लानपुष्पापहारः <ls>R. 5. 74.</ls> {@--2@} Fine, delicate. {@--3@} Loose, wide apart. {@--4@} Rare, scarcely found, unfrequent; विरला हि तेषामुपदेष्टारः <ls>K.</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 29.</ls> {@--5@} Few, little (referring to number or quantity); तत्त्वं किमपि काव्यानां जानाति विरलो भुवि <ls>Bv. 1. 117</ls>; विरलातपच्छविः <ls>Śi. 9. 3.</ls> {@--6@} Remote, distant, long (as time, distance &c.). --लं Curds, coagulated milk. --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Scarcely, rarely, not frequently.
